body.name: Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Corded Handheld Small Light Weight High Suction 18KPa Electric Broom for Home Apartment Office Hardwood Floors Carpet Pet Hair Litter Clean, 3.5Ib Weight - 14ft Cord
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 44 mins
features: 🌈【Powerful Suction--18KPa 】Compared with cordless vacuum cleaners of the same level (most of them have a suction of 6-9KPa), the suction of this corded vacuum cleaner has been increased almost 90% to 18KPa, reaching the suction of advanced cordless vacuum cleaners, with high cost performance. Can easily suck coin,cat litter, cereal, hair and dust.

🌈【Lightweight + Small 】The weight of the whole stick vacuum is only 3.5Ib, very light. The unique handle design makes the center of gravity of the vacuum cleaner lower and reduces the fatigue of the arm. It is easy to store very suitable for us to clean their homes apartments and offices.

🌈【Floor+Carpet】Our floor brush is a direct-suction brush design, which will not entangle hair. It can work well on wood floors and long and short velvet carpets.For pet owners, it is a wise choice to have an independent vacuum cleaner to treat pet hair, cat litter and food residue.

🌈【Sofa+Car】This stick vacuum cleaner is equipped with a strip brush suitable for sofa and car cleaning, which can clean the gap well. You can combine it as a car vacuum .Moreover, using this brush to clean curtains and window gaps is also a good choice.

🌈【Safety】A temperature control switch is installed to automatically cut off the power supply when the vacuum cleaner is overloaded. Cleaning the filter element frequently helps to maintain suction, and we also provide an extra filter for replacement.

🌟【12 months worry-free after-sales service】BUTY BULU Thank you for choosing our vacuum cleaner. Our professional and excellent after-sales team will provide you with the most patient service for any problems in product use! If you have any questions, please contact us directly and we will solve your problems as soon as possible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tile floors
reviews.reviewText: Our house has tile floors throughout, we started with a Dyson stick vac, a total waste of money. It had a rotating brush in the head that threw trash out ahead of it. Then went to a cheap one from Walmart but had the same issue with its brush. Started looking for a vac without a brush and found this little guy. It is perfect for what we needed. It's light weight, has good suction, and easy to use. If I had any complaints, it would be that I would like for it to fasten together better. The tubes just slid together and really don't attach very tight. But, overall, I would highly recommend this little guy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: It is lightweight and has good suction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Have realistic expectations.. this is a dust buster for only $35-
reviews.reviewText: Keeping realistic expectations with the vacuums physical ability is best way to decide if its right for your need! Reality- it’s a Dust Buster!! (Throwback name to the 80’s anyway..!!) Best to snag small spills or debris.. light touch up without use of the heavy artillery! It’s works as a perk to get hard to reach places- BUT, not designed to vacuum a home !! If lucky, this may execute fully in a dorm room or corporate office space.. all dependent on size of space.. and type flooring.NOT best on carpet except for specific spot-picker-upper! It’s solid in tight stair corners, or to grab ceiling cobwebs + clean off ceiling fans.. awesome to get under couch cushions or in a cars crack/crevices, crumbs under barstool counter post bfast.. and dust underneath furniture- hence its name, Dust Buster..!!!Unit surprised me by its suction- especially with its small size motor- I was impressed. Tbh, I discarded all attachments with exception of x2 extender poles.. leaving its end wide open. This keeps debris from simply being pushed around by brush attachment.. or rolling over it! Design truly isn't made to have this type add ons, IMHO! Note: strong enough to carry debris up both extender tubes- ha! even picking up x2 Lego pieces in the process.. to give you idea of strength!Pro/Con of plug: device wont lose power just minutes into job as this stays solid start to finish. Ready when you are.. it can work for a lot longer amount at a time bc endless power. On flip side: cord is shorter then expected.. harder to use in a car- or RV.. must be pulled into garage by power source.Pieces connect with ease.. shimmy into tight fit and release the same way. Clear canister lets you see when it needs to empty. Includes replacement filter.. a nice touch. Fun color to match decor- As one who usually isn’t a fan of dust buster, Im liking the power and extenders-lightweight design all for $35. Hoping info can help you.. stay safe everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for the price!!!
reviews.reviewText: So, I know that the price is definitely a good deal and I was a bit worried! Once I received my vacuum cleaner I was very surprised about the strength of the motor is this. I truly don’t care about the other parts that much but as a vacuum cleaner it is a must buy!!! Picks up everything and I mean everything!!! Very powerful and worth every penny. Highly recommended for small apartments or spaces!!!! Best purchase this year!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Short cord, surprisingly good suction
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my office at work (which has tile floor). During the fall & winter months, leaves and dirt tend to get tracked inside. We've had a lot of turnover in the custodial staff & the offices just don't get vacuumed/mopped frequently. As I took this out of the box, my thought was "what did I waste money on?". The extention pieces don't lock together. It's just a slip-fit. The first time I assembled it, I guess I didn't have it pushed together far enough and it fell apart when I picked it up. The floor piece doesn't have any sort of brush.The cord is quite short. I tested it in my bedroom and I had to change plugs just to get to the opposite wall. For my office it will be fine (it's the size of a walk-in-closet).When I first turned it in, I was very pleasantly surprised by the suction power and disgusted by how much dirt, hair and cat fur it picked up from behind the door (where Roomba never goes).Overall, it's good for my usage & it's compact enough to store in a drawer out of sight. Since it is corded, I don't have to worry about charging it prior to using it (as I don't expect to use it frequently).
